Title: Extends the time period for recovery of energy performance contract costs incurred by school districts
Summary: Extends the time period from eighteen years to twenty-five years that a school shall be guaranteed recovery of energy performance contract costs from energy savings incurred by school districts over that time period.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to extending the time period for guaranteed recovery of energy performance contract costs from energy savings incurred by school districts
